adjectives.description: mournful (comparative mournfuller or more mournful, superlative mournfullest or most mournful)

entries.meaning: Filled with grief or sadness; being in a state in which one mourns.

examples: Having deposited our mournful burden upon tressels within this region of horror, we partially turned aside the yet unscrewed lid of the coffin, and looked upon the face of the tenant.
